My plan is to help the middle class.
Trade has to work for America.
That means crack down on cheaters like China.
It means open up new markets.
Next, you've got to balance the budget.
You've got to cut the deficit.
You've got to stop spending more money than we take in.
Have tax policies, regulations and healthcare policies that help small business.
We put those in place, we'll add 12 million new jobs in four years.
I'm Mitt Romney and I approve this message.
